field.name: label
field.title: Essay Field Label
field.comment: Essay form field label for this essay type.

field.name: name
field.title: Essay Field Name
field.comment: Essay form field name for this essay type.

field.name: grouping
field.title: Form Name
field.comment: The code for each form determines which essay type field(s) which belong to that form by selecting essay type records where grouping matches the form name.

field.name: weight
field.comment: Controls essay field sort order when a form includes multiple essays.

field.name: max_word_count
field.comment: Maximum number of words allowed in essays of this type. If 0, then word count is unlimited.

field.name: attributes
field.title: Field Attributes
field.comment: Additional attributes needed to render the essay form field (expected usage will be cols and rows for textarea).

field.name: is_required
field.comment: Is this essay required to complete the application?
